Serial module¶

Module which has functions and classes to manage the connection and communication with the card

Classes:

ManageConnection(frame)

Class with useful methods to manage Connection related with the frame

TerminalSetup()

Placeholder for various terminal settings.
class Serial.ManageConnection(frame)¶

Bases: object

Class with useful methods to manage Connection related with the frame

Methods:

downloadFile(filepath, filename)

downloadRun(filename)

Execute the file gived in params on the MicroPython card

put_cmd(msg)

Send a Python command to the connected card
downloadFile(filepath, filename)¶
downloadRun(filename)¶

Execute the file gived in params on the MicroPython card

Parameters

filename (str) – the path of the file to execute(root is the device connected)

put_cmd(msg)¶

Send a Python command to the connected card

Parameters

msg (str) – command to send

class Serial.TerminalSetup¶

Bases: object

Placeholder for various terminal settings. Used to pass the options to the TerminalSettingsDialog.
